ItemTooltips.mantle: One of these to get that base mana up
ItemTooltips.boots: Gotta go fast, especially with that long cast animation
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: GOTTA GO FAST, Gotta hit hard
ItemTooltips.void_stone: Mana Regen, screw arcanes, and this isn't a full-on supportive build
ItemTooltips.null_talisman: Base Mana, it's good for you- you spell-chaining SoB
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Third Disable? Don't Mind if I do!
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Just... get it if it feels right
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: I never get this stupid item on Bane, but some people do.
ItemTooltips.invis_sword: If the troll-o-meter is at max, this is your item.
